ga: 31 Lúnasa 2020 – An Fhreagairt Dhomhanda ar an gCoróinvíreas: An Coimisiún páirteach sa tSaoráid Rochtana Domhanda ar Vacsaíní in aghaidh COVID-19
en: 31 August 2020 - Coronavirus Global Response: The Commission joins the COVID-19 Vaccine Global Access Facility

en: To accelerate the development and manufacture of COVID-19 vaccines for everyone who needs them, the Commission joins the ‘COVID-19 Vaccine Global Access Facility’.

en: The first contract that the European Commission negotiated on behalf of the EU Member States with a pharmaceutical company entered into force following the formal signature between AstraZeneca and the Commission.

en: Two men in a workshop

en: On 24 and 25 August, the Commission presented proposals to the Council to grant financial support of €87.

en: researcher in a laboratory

en: 20 August 2020 – The European Commission continues expanding future vaccines portfolio through new talks with CureVac

en: The Commission has concluded exploratory talks with CureVac to potentially purchase a vaccine against COVID-19.

en: The European Commission has reached a first agreement with the pharmaceutical company AstraZeneca to purchase a potential vaccine against COVID-19.

en: Researcher working on vaccine

en: 13 August 2020 – The European Commission concludes further talks to secure future vaccine

en: The Commission has concluded exploratory talks with Johnson & Johnson to purchase a potential vaccine against the coronavirus.

ga: Seo mar a labhair an tUachtarán von der Leyen: “Tá vacsaín shábháilte éifeachtach in aghaidh an choróinvíris de dhíth orainn, ar mhaithe le beatha ár saoránach agus lenár ngeilleagar.
en: President von der Leyen said: “Our citizens' lives and our economy need a safe and effective vaccine against the coronavirus.

en: The Commission will support 23 new research projects with €128 million in response to the coronavirus crisis.

en: Sanofi talks

en: 31 July 2020 – The European Commission concludes talks to secure a future coronavirus vaccine

en: The European Commission has concluded exploratory talks with the pharmaceutical company Sanofi to purchase a potential COVID-19 vaccine.

en: 29 July 2020 - European Commission secures EU access to Remdesivir for treatment of COVID-19

ga: Tá conradh €63 mhilliún sínithe ag an gCoimisiún leis an gcuideachta chógaisíochta Gilead chun dáileoga cóireála Veklury, ainm branda Remdesivir, a fháil.
en: The Commission has signed a €63 million contract with the pharmaceutical company Gilead to secure treatment doses of Veklury, the brand name for Remdesivir.

ga: 27 Iúil 2020 – Glao seolta ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach ar chomhpháirtíochtaí nuálacha freagartha agus téarnaimh idir réigiúin an Aontais
en: 27 July 2020 - The European Commission launches call for innovative response and recovery partnerships between EU regions

ga: Chun tacú leis an bhfreagairt ar an gcoróinvíreas agus an téarnamh uaidh, agus chun cuidiú le réigiúin deiseanna a thapú, tá glao ar léirithe spéise seolta ag an gCoimisiún le haghaidh tionscadail nuálacha idir réigiúin, tionscadail a dhíreoidh ar an méid seo a leanas: forbairt an luachshlabhra leighis; sábháilteacht agus bainistiú dramhaíola leighis; turasóireacht inbhuanaithe agus turasóireacht dhigiteach; agus forbairt teicneolaíochtaí hidrigine i réigiúin atá dian ar charbóin.
en: To support the coronavirus response and recovery, and to help regions seize opportunities, the Commission is launching a call for expressions of interest for innovation projects between regions, focusing on four thematic areas: development of the medical value chain; safety and management of medical waste; sustainable and digital tourism; and the development of hydrogen technologies in carbon-intensive regions.

ga: Ursula von der leyen
en: Ursula von der leyen

ga: 23 Iúil 2020 – Uachtarán an Choimisiúin, Ursula von der Leyen agus í ag labhairt i bParlaimint na hEorpa: “Tá sé de dheis againn anois, i gcomhar le chéile, cor cinniúna a bhaint amach i stair na hEorpa.”
en: 23 July 2020 – Commission President von der Leyen in the European Parliament: “Together, we now have the chance to achieve something historic for Europe.”

ga: Tar éis don Chomhairle Eorpach teacht ar chomhaontú maidir le Plean Téarnaimh an Aontais Eorpaigh, seo mar a labhair Uachtarán an Choimisiúin, Ursula von der Leyen, i bParlaimint na hEorpa: “Faoi láthair, tá cumas airgeadais ollmhór againn nach bhfacthas riamh roimhe - €1.
en: Following an agreement in the European Council on Europe’s Recovery Plan, Commission President von der Leyen said in the European Parliament: “We now have massive and unprecedented financial firepower - €1.

en: budget

ga: 21 Iúil 2020 – Comhaontú bainte amach ag ceannairí na hEorpa maidir leis an bplean téarnaimh agus maidir le buiséad fadtéarmach 2021-2027 na hEorpa
en: 21 July 2020 – European leaders reach a deal on the recovery plan and European long-term budget 2021-2027

en: After 4 long days and nights of negotiations, EU leaders successfully agreed on the recovery plan for Europe.

en: testing lab image

en: 15 July 2020 - Commission strengthens preparedness for possible future coronavirus outbreaks

ga: Agus é mar aidhm ag an gCoimisiún beatha daoine a shábháil agus dianghlasáil a sheachaint, tá bearta láithreacha gearrthéarmacha á leagan amach aige chun ullmhacht sláinte an Aontais Eorpaigh a neartú i leith ráigeanna féideartha an choróinvíris amach anseo.
en: While aiming to save lives and to avoid lockdowns, the Commission is setting out immediate short-term measures to strengthen EU health preparedness in case of possible future coronavirus outbreaks.

ga: Ursula von der Leyen, President of the European Commission speeking at the European Parliament
en: Ursula von der Leyen, President of the European Commission speeking at the European Parliament

en: 8 July 2020 – President Ursula von der Leyen: we can emerge stronger from this crisis

ga: Agus í ag labhairt le Parlaimint na hEorpa ag tús Uachtaránacht na Gearmáine de Chomhairle an Aontais Eorpaigh, seo mar a labhair an tUachtarán von der Leyen: “Is é is brí leis an dlúthpháirtíocht go dtugtar tacaíocht bhreise dóibh siúd a bhfuil sí de dhíth orthu.
en: When addressing the European Parliament on the occasion of the start of the German Presidency of the Council of the EU, President von der Leyen said: “Solidarity means that those who need it, get more support.

en: Despite the swift and comprehensive policy response to the corona-crisis at both EU and national levels, the Summer 2020 Economic Forecast projects a deep recession in the EU economy this year.

en: 1 July 2020 – Youth Employment Support: a bridge to jobs for the next generation of Europeans

en: The ‘Global Goal: Unite for our Future' pledging summit organised by President von der Leyen and Global Citizen on 27 June mobilised €6.

en: The global pledging summit and concert organised by the Commission and Global Citizen is happening this Saturday (27 June).

ga: Coronavirus global response

en: 22 June 2020 - Coronavirus Global Response: Commission announces world leaders’ summit and concert line-up for 27 June pledging event

ga: Tá sé de chumhacht ag ealaíontóirí claochlú a spreagadh.

en: 17 June 2020 – EU COVID-19 vaccines strategy unveiled

ga: Tá straitéis Eorpach curtha i láthair ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach chun luas a chur le forbairt, monarú agus úsáid vacsaíní in aghaidh an choróinvíris, ós rud é gurb é sin an seans is fearr atá againn an lámh in uachtar a fháil ar an bpaindéim go buan laistigh de thréimhse 12 mhí go 18 mí, nó níos luaithe.
en: The European Commission has presented a European strategy to accelerate the development, manufacturing and deployment of coronavirus vaccines as it is our best bet at permanently beating the pandemic within a timeframe of 12 to 18 months, if not earlier.

ga: 15 Meitheamh 2020 – ‘Re-open EU’ – ardán gréasáin nua seolta chun an tsaorghluaiseacht agus an turasóireacht a chur ar obair arís go sábháilte san Aontas Eorpach

en: The European Commission has launched ‘Re-open EU’, a web platform that contains essential information for a safe relaunch of free movement and tourism across Europe, so that you confidently can enjoy your upcoming holidays.

en: man with mask checking his phone

ga: 10 Meitheamh 2020 – Dlús á chur ag an Aontas Eorpach leis na bearta chun dul i ngleic le bréagaisnéis faoin gcoróinvíreas
en: 10 June 2020 – EU steps up action to fight coronavirus disinformation

ga: Tá dlús á chur ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach agus an tArdionadaí leis an gcomhrac in aghaidh bréagaisnéis faoin gcoróinvíreas trí bhealach chun cinn a mholadh i dTeachtaireacht Chomhpháirteach.
en: The European Commission and the High Representative are stepping up the fight against coronavirus disinformation by proposing a way forward in a Joint Communication.

ga: Interior of an innovation lab
en: Interior of an innovation lab

ga: 8 Meitheamh 2020 – Tá €314 mhilliún deonaithe ag an Aontas Eorpach do chuideachtaí nuálacha chun an coróinvíreas a chomhrac agus chun tacú leis an téarnamh
en: 8 June 2020 – To fight the coronavirus and to support the recovery, EU grants €314 million to innovative companies

ga: Tá sé fógartha ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach go bhfuil beagnach €166 mhilliún bronnta aige ar 36 chuideachta trí chlár píolótach luasaire na Comhairle Nuálaíochta Eorpaí chun cabhrú leis na tionscadail nuálacha seo a leanas: ciarsúir bhithdhí-éilliúcháin, córais monatóireachta aerála ar chostas íseal a fhorbairt le haghaidh teagmhais le líon mór taismeach, agus ardán antasubstaintí chun cóireáil a chur ar chásanna tromchúiseacha ionfhabhtaithe.
en: The European Commission has announced that it has awarded 36 companies with nearly €166 million, via the European Innovation Council Accelerator Pilot, will work on pioneering projects: bio-decontamination wipes, developing low-cost mass casualty ventilation monitoring systems, and an antibody platform to treat severe cases of infection.

ga: 4 Meitheamh 2020 – €300 milliún geallta ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach don Chomhaontas Vacsaíne

ga: An 4 Meitheamh, d’fhógair an Coimisiún Eorpach go raibh €300 milliún á ghealladh aige do Gavi, an Comhaontas Vacsaíne, le haghaidh na tréimhse 2021-2025.
en: On 4 June, the European Commission announced a €300 million pledge to Gavi, the Vaccine Alliance, for the period 2021–2025.

ga: 3 Meitheamh 2020 – Na chéad bearta déanta ag an gCoimisiún i dtreo Straitéis Chógaisíochta don Eoraip a ghlacadh
en: 3 June 2020 – Commission takes first step towards adoption of a Pharmaceutical Strategy for Europe

ga: Tá treochlár maidir le Straitéis Chógaisíochta na hEorpa foilsithe ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach.
en: The European Commission has published a roadmap on the Pharmaceutical Strategy for Europe.

en: global response

ga: 28 Bealtaine 2020 – An Fhreagairt Dhomhanda ar an gCoróinvíreas: “An Sprioc Dhomhanda: Aontú ar mhaithe leis an Todhchaí” seolta le tacaíocht ó Global Citizen
en: 28 May 2020 - Coronavirus Global Response: “Global Goal: Unite For Our Future” kick-off with support from Global Citizen

ga: Cuireadh tús leis an bhFreagairt Dhomhanda ar an gCoróinvíreas an 4 Bealtaine agus go dtí seo tá €9.
en: The Coronavirus Global Response was kick-started on 4 May and has so far raised €9,8 billion for universal access to affordable coronavirus vaccination, treatments and testing.

ga: Recovery plan for Europe
en: Recovery plan for Europe

ga: 27 Bealtaine 2020 – Seo uain na hEorpa: Plean Téarnaimh ollmhór ar fiú €2.4 trilliún é curtha i láthair chun deisiú agus ullmhú a dhéanamh le haghaidh na chéad ghlúine eile
en: 27 May 2020 - Europe’s moment: major €2,4 trillion Recovery Plan for Europe unveiled to repair and prepare for the next generation

ga: D’fhonn tús a chur le téarnamh na hEorpa agus beatha daoine, slite beatha agus poist a chosaint, tá plean téarnaimh ollmhór ar fiú €2.
en: To kick-start the European recovery, protect lives, livelihoods and jobs, the European Commission is proposing a major €2,4 trillion recovery plan which is based on using the full potential of a powerful, modern and revamped EU budget to deliver a more sustainable, digital, inclusive and fair Europe.

ga: 26 Bealtaine 2020 – Dlúthpháirtíocht i gcomhthéacs an choróinvíris: Lucht tionsclaíochta an Aontais ag teacht le chéile chun cuidiú le saoránaigh an Aontais
en: 26 May 2020 - Coronavirus solidarity: EU Industry steps in to protect European citizens

ga: Tá dlúthpháirtíocht den scoth léirithe ag cuideachtaí na hEorpa le linn na géarchéime.
en: European companies have shown extraordinary solidarity in this crisis.

ga: EU semester
en: EU semester

ga: 20 Bealtaine 2020 – Pacáiste an Earraigh, an Seimeastar Eorpach: Moltaí maidir le freagairt chomhordaithe ar phaindéim an choróinvíris
en: 20 May 2020 - European Semester Spring Package: Recommendations for a coordinated response to the coronavirus pandemic

ga: An 20 Bealtaine, chuir an Coimisiún Eorpach moltaí tírshonracha i láthair le haghaidh Bhallstáit uile an Aontais agus le haghaidh na Ríochta Aontaithe, moltaí atá bunaithe ar straitéis fáis an Choimisiúin, lena gcuirtear inbhuanaitheacht iomaíoch chun cinn le geilleagar a thógáil a fhóireann do dhaoine agus don phláinéad araon.
en: On 20 May, the European Commission proposed country-specific recommendations for all EU Members States and the United Kingdom, based upon the Commission’s growth strategy, which promotes competitive sustainability to build an economy that works for people and the planet.

en: researcher covid-19

ga: Tá €122 mhilliún eile slógtha ag an gCoimisiún óna chlár taighde agus nuálaíochta, Fís 2020, le haghaidh taighde a bhfuil géarghá leis ar an gcoróinvíreas.
en: The Commission has mobilised another €122 million from its research and innovation programme, Horizon 2020, for urgently needed research into the coronavirus.

ga: airport
en: airport

ga: 13 Bealtaine 2020 – Tús a chur arís, go sábháilte leis an taisteal agus turasóireacht na hEorpa a chur ar a boinn arís: Gníomhartha á nglacadh ag an gCoimisiún
en: 13 May 2020 – Safely resuming travel and rebooting Europe’s tourism: Commission takes action

ga: Chun go mbeidh cead ag daoine dul ar saoire agus am a chaitheamh le clann agus cairde, chun go mbeidh gnólachtaí turasóireachta in ann a ndoirse a oscailt arís tar éis na míonna faoi dhianghlasáil, agus chun cabhrú leis na Ballstáit deireadh a chur de réir a chéile leis na srianta taistil agus na réamhchúraimí sláinte a bhfuil gá leo a urramú san am céanna, chuir an Coimisiún Eorpach sraith treoirlínte agus moltaí i láthair le haghaidh turasóirí, taistealaithe agus gnólachtaí.
en: To allow people to take holidays and catch up with their friends and families, to let tourism businesses reopen after months of being locked down, and to help Member States help gradually lift travel restrictions while respecting the necessary health precautions, the European Commission presented a set of guidelines and recommendations for tourists, travellers and businesses.

en: The Commission selected 8 large-scale research projects aimed at developing treatments and diagnostics for the coronavirus, in a fast-track call for proposals launched in March by the Innovative Medicines Initiative (IMI), a public-private partnership.

en: masks delivery

en: Following previous deliveries to Italy, Spain and Croatia, additional batches of masks are being delivered to North Macedonia and Montenegro via rescEU – the common European reserve of medical equipment to help countries affected by the coronavirus outbreak.

en: 8 May 2020 – European solidarity in action – the Commission delivers first batch of 1.5 million masks to support EU health workers

en: 7 May 2020 – Commission helps Member States address the shortages of health workers speed up the recognition of health workers’ professional qualifications

en: To help address the shortages of health workers, the Commission issued a Communication which provides guidance for Member States.

ga: Map of spring economic forecast
en: Map of spring economic forecast

ga: 6 Bealtaine 2020 – Réamhaisnéis Eacnamaíoch Earrach 2020 – cúlú eacnamaíoch agus téarnamh
en: 6 May 2020 – Spring 2020 Economic Forecast – recession and recovery

ga: In ainneoin na bhfreagairtí tapa cinntitheacha ón Aontas agus ó na Ballstáit, beidh cúlú eacnamaíoch san Aontas i mbliana ós rud é gur suaitheadh eacnamaíoch an-mhór é paindéim an choróinvíris.
en: Despite the swift and decisive EU and national responses, the EU economy will experience a recession this year as the coronavirus pandemic came as a major economic shock.

ga: Picture of President von der Leyen
en: Picture of President von der Leyen

ga: 4 Bealtaine 2020 – An Fhreagairt Dhomhanda ar an gCoróinvíreas Tiomsaíodh €7.4 billiún ó dheontóirí ar fud an domhain le haghaidh rochtain uilíoch ar vacsaíní
en: 4 May 2020 – Coronavirus Global Response: €7,4 billion raised from donors worldwide for universal access to vaccines

ga: Chláraigh an Coimisiún Eorpach €7.
en: The European Commission registered €7.

ga: Picture of the banner on the Berlaymont building
en: Picture of the banner on the Berlaymont building

ga: 2 Bealtaine 2020 – Ag druidim linn: Imeacht gealltanas na Freagartha Domhanda ar an gCoróinvíreas le tosú Dé Luain, an 4 Bealtaine
en: 2 May 2020 – Final countdown: Coronavirus Global Response pledging marathon starts on Monday 4 May

ga: Mar chuid den Fhreagairt Dhomhanda ar an gCoróinvíreas, tá an tAontas Eorpach ag obair i gcomhar le comhpháirtithe domhanda chun tús a chur le hiarracht gealltanas chun córacha, vacsaíní agus diagnóisic a fhorbairt.
en: With the Coronavirus Global Response, the European Union is joining forces with global partners to kick-start a worldwide pledging effort to develop treatments, vaccines and diagnostics.

ga: Seo mar a labhair an tUachtarán von der Leyen: “An 4 Bealtaine, is mian linn muintir an domhain uile a thabhairt le chéile chun cosaint, diagnóisic agus córacha in aghaidh an choróinvíris a chur ar fáil.
en: President von der Leyen said: “On 4 May, we want to bring the world together to deliver on prevention, diagnostics and treatments against coronavirus.

ga: online consumers
en: online consumers

ga: 30 Aibreán 2020 – Méadú ar iarrachtaí an Choimisiúin Eorpaigh camscéimeanna a chosc agus tomhaltóirí a chosaint
en: 30 April 2020 – European Commission doubles down on prevening scams and protecting consumers

ga: Tá an Coimisiún Eorpach tiomanta tomhaltóirí a chosaint ar líne – go háirithe le linn phaindéim an choróinvíris agus maíomh bréagach á dhéanamh nó táirgí bréige á gcur chun cinn ag roinnt gníomhaithe bradacha.
en: The European Commission is committed to protecting consumers online – especially during the coronavirus pandemic where some rogue actors are promoting false claims or scam products.

ga: western balkans aid
en: western balkans aid

ga: 29 Aibreán 2020 – Dul i ngleic le géarchéim an choróinvíris: Dlús á chur ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach lena thacaíocht do na Balcáin Thiar
en: 29 April 2020 – Tackling the coronavirus crisis: European Commission steps up its support to the Western Balkans

ga: Tá sé fógartha ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach go bhfuil níos mó ná €3.
en: The European Commission has announced over €3.

ga: Valdis Dombrovskis Press Conference
en: Valdis Dombrovskis Press Conference

ga: 28 Aibreán 2020 – Pacáiste baincéireachta: ag tacú le teaghlaigh agus gnólachtaí san Aontas Eorpach
en: 28 April 2020 – Banking package: supporting households and businesses in the EU

ga: Ghlac an Coimisiún Eorpach pacáiste baincéireachta le cinntiú go leanfadh na bainc ar aghaidh ag tabhairt iasachtaí airgid, ag tacú leis an ngeilleagar agus ag cuidiú le tionchair eacnamaíocha an choróinvíris a mhaolú.
en: To ensure that banks can continue to lend money, support the economy and help mitigate the economic impacts of the Coronavirus, the European Commission has adopted a banking package.

ga: global summit
en: global summit

ga: 27 Aibreán 2020 – Iarracht gealltanas dhomhanda seolta ag an Aontas Eorpach i gcomhar le comhpháirtithe
en: 27 April 2020 - EU launches global pledging effort with partners

ga: Ionas gur féidir leis diagnóisic, teiripic agus vacsaíní atá sábháilte, éifeachtach agus inacmhainne in aghaidh an choróinvíris a fhorbairt agus a chur ar fáil, tá an tAontas ag obair i gcomhar le comhpháirtithe domhanda chun tús a chur le hiarracht gealltanas – an Fhreagairt Dhomhanda ar an gCoróinvíreas – iarracht a thosófar an 4 Bealtaine 2020.
en: To develop and deploy safe, effective and affordable diagnostics, therapeutics and vaccines against coronavirus, the European Union is joining forces with global partners to kick-start a pledging effort – the Coronavirus Global Response – starting on 4 May 2020.

ga: ursula von der leyen video conference
en: ursula von der leyen video conference

ga: An 24 Aibreán 2020 – An Coimisiún Eorpach chun plean téarnaimh coiteann a mhúnlú a bhfuil buiséad fadtéarmach athchóirithe de chuid an Aontais lárnach ann
en: 24 April 2020 – European Commission to shape a common recovery plan with a revamped EU long-term budget at its heart

ga: Chuir ceannairí na hEorpa de chúram ar an gCoimisiún Eorpach freagairt chomhpháirteach ar an ngéarchéim a mhúnlú tar éis físchomhdhála an 23 Aibreán.
en: European leaders tasked the European Commission with shaping a collective response to the crisis following a videoconference on 23 April.

ga: agricolture programmes
en: agricolture programmes

ga: An 23 Aibreán 2020 – Bearta eisceachtúla chun tacú le hearnáil an bhia agus na talmhaíochta
en: 23 April 2020 - Exceptional measures to support the agricultural food sector

ga: Ar mhaithe le tacú go pras le hearnáil na talmhaíochta agus leis na margaí bia i gcomhthéacs na ráige den choróinvíreas, tá bearta eisceachtúla molta ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach.
en: To swiftly support agricultural sector and food markets following the outbreak of the coronavirus, the European Commission has proposed exceptional measures.

ga: Tá sé beartaithe ag an gCoimisiún cabhair le haghaidh stóráil phríobháideach a dheonú i gcomhair táirgí déiríochta agus feola, sin agus solúbthacht a dheonú i dtaca le cur i bhfeidhm clár tacaíochta margaidh chun tosaíochtaí maoinithe a athdhíriú, agus maolú eisceachtúil ó rialacha iomaíochta an Aontais a dheonú chun earnálacha éagsúla de na margaí a chobhsú.
en: The Commission proposes to grant private storage aid for dairy and meat products, flexibility in the implementation of market support programmes to refocus funding priorities, and exceptional derogation from EU competition rules to stabilise the markets in different sectors.

ga: EU flags
en: EU flags

ga: An 22 Aibreán 2020 – Pacáiste cúnaimh airgeadais dar luach €3 bhilliún le haghaidh deich dtír chomharsanachta
en: 22 April 2020 - €3 billion financial assistance package for ten neighbouring countries

ga: Mhol an Coimisiún pacáiste cúnaimh macrairgeadais dar luach €3 bhilliún a thabhairt do dheich gcinn de chomhpháirtithe an mhéadaithe agus de chomhpháirtithe comharsanachta, agus é mar aidhm dó teorainn a chur le hiarmhairtí eacnamaíocha ghéarchéim an choróinvíris sna tíortha comhpháirtíochta.
en: The Commission proposed a €3 billion macro-financial assistance package to ten enlargement and neighbourhood partners with the aim to limit the economic fallout of the coronavirus crisis in partner countries.

ga: Image of hands wearing gloves
en: Image of hands wearing gloves

ga: An 21 Aibreán 2020 – Tacaíocht slógtha ag an Aontas don Iodáil, don Chróit agus do thíortha comharsanachta
en: 21 April 2020 - EU mobilises support for Italy, Croatia and neighbouring countries

ga: Tar éis don Aontas iarratais ar chúnamh a fháil trí Shásra an Aontais um Chosaint Shibhialta i gcomhthéacs an chomhraic i gcoinne phaindéim an choróinvíris, tá seachadadh lastas cúnaimh á chomhordú agus á chómhaoiniú aige san Aontas Eorpach féin agus sna tíortha comharsanachta.
en: The EU coordinates and co-finances the delivery of aid shipments in the EU and in neighbouring countries, after requests for assistance via the EU Civil Protection Mechanism in the fight against the coronavirus pandemic.

ga: Image of a server room
en: Image of a server room

ga: An 20 Aibreán 2020 – An coróinvíreas: Ardán nua malartaithe sonraí le haghaidh taighdeoirí
en: 20 April 2020 – Coronavirus: New data sharing platform for researchers

ga: Tá ardán nua sonraí de chuid an Aontais maidir le COVID-19 curtha ar bun ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach agus a chomhpháirtithe chun sonraí taighde cuimsitheacha a bhaineann leis an gcoróinvíreas a bhailiú agus a mhalartú go tapa, cuir i gcás sonraí maidir le seichimh DNA, struchtúir próitéine, sonraí ó thaighde réamhchliniciúil agus ó thrialacha cliniciúla agus sonraí eipidéimeolaíocha, chun na hiarrachtaí taighde a bhrú chun cinn.
en: An EU COVID-19 Data Platform has been established by the European Commission and partners to rapidly collect and share comprehensive coronavirus research data, such as DNA sequences, protein structures, data from pre-clinical research and clinical trials, as well as epidemiological data, to advance research efforts.

ga: passenger in an airport
en: passenger in an airport

ga: An 17 Aibreán 2020 – Os cionn 500,000 saoránach den Aontas tugtha abhaile
en: 17 April 2020 - Over 500,000 EU citizens brought home

ga: D’éirigh leis an Aontas Eorpach níos mó ná leathmhilliún saoránach, a ndearna srianta taistil an choróinvíris difear dóibh, a thabhairt abhaile trí eitiltí aisdúichithe a mhaoiniú agus trí thabhairt faoi dhianchomhar consalach.
en: The EU has managed to bring home over half a million citizens affected by coronavirus travel restrictions by funding repatriation flights and carrying out intense consular cooperation.

ga: ursula von der leyen press conference
en: ursula von der leyen press conference

ga: An 16 Aibreán 2020 – An tUachtarán von der Leyen: “Beidh an buiséad Eorpach ina chrann taca ag an téarnamh”
en: 16 April – 2020 – President von der Leyen: “The European budget will be the mothership of Europe’s recovery”

ga: Cé gur fiú cuid mhaith os cionn €3 thrilliún freagairt na hEorpa le chéile – tá sé sin ar an bhfreagairt is láidre aon áit ar domhan – tá a fhios againn go mbeidh níos mó ag teastáil, arsa an tUachtarán von der Leyen i bParlaimint na hEorpa.
en: Despite Europe’s collective response being well above €3 trillion – the most impressive response in the world - more is needed, President von der Leyen said at the European Parliament.

ga: woman holding her phone
en: woman holding her phone

ga: An 16 Aibreán 2020 – Cur chuige Eorpach i leith aipeanna rianaithe – go hiomlán deonach agus an príobháideachas á urramú
en: 16 April – 2020 – A European approach to tracing apps – completely voluntary and fully respecting privacy

ga: Chun córais rianaithe teagmhálaithe agus rabhaidh a chur ar bun atá deonach agus lena n-urramaítear an príobháideachas go hiomlán, tá uirlisí agus treoirlínte curtha i láthair ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach.
en: To establish voluntary contact tracing and warning systems that fully respect privacy, the European Commission has put forward a toolbox and guidelines.

ga: charles michel and ursula von der leyen
en: charles michel and ursula von der leyen

ga: An 15 Aibreán 2020 – Treochlár Eorpach i dtaca le deireadh a chur leis na bearta imshrianta
en: 15 April 2020 – A European roadmap to lifting containment measures

ga: Chuir an Coimisiún Eorpach, i gcomhar le hUachtarán na Comhairle Eorpaí, treochlár, moltaí agus príomhphrionsabail i láthair i dtaca le deireadh a chur leis na bearta imshrianta.
en: The European Commission, in cooperation with the President of the European Council put forward a roadmap, recommendations and key principles to lifting the containment measures.

ga: Protective medical equipment
en: Protective medical equipment

ga: An 14 Aibreán 2020 – €2.7 billiún ó bhuiséad an Aontais chun tacú leis an earnáil cúraim sláinte
en: 14 April 2020 – €2,7 billion from the EU budget to support the healthcare sector

ga: Chun tacaíocht dhíreach a thabhairt do na córais cúraim sláinte i mBallstáit an Aontais, mhol an Coimisiún Eorpach Ionstraim Tacaíochta Éigeandála an Aontais a ghníomhachtú, agus d’fhormheas an Chomhairle an beart sin go tapa an 14 Aibreán.
en: To directly support healthcare systems in EU countries, the European Commission proposed to activate the EU’s Emergency Support Instrument – a measure that that Council quickly approved on 14 April.

ga: pills
en: pills

ga: An 8 Aibreán 2020 – €15.6 billiún le haghaidh fhreagairt an Aontais ar an gcoróinvíreas; D’iarr an tAontas ar na Ballstáit a chinntiú go mbeidh cógais leighis ar fáil
en: 8 April 2020 – €15.6 billion for global EU coronavirus response; EU calls on Member States to ensure availability of medicines

ga: D’fhonn an coróinvíreas a chomhrac ar fud an domhain, tacóidh an tAontas leis an tsláinte phoiblí agus tabharfaidh sé aghaidh ar riachtanais dhaonnúla agus sláintíochta na dtíortha comhpháirtíochta ar fud an domhain trí chúnamh airgeadais ar fiú níos mó ná €15.
en: To fight the coronavirus across the globe, the EU will support the public health and address the humanitarian and sanitary needs of partner countries across the globe by providing financial assistance of more than €15.

ga: coronavirus medical unit
en: coronavirus medical unit

ga: An 7 Aibreán 2020 – Cór Liachta an Aontais imlonnaithe go dtí an Iodáil
en: 07 April 2020 - EU Medical Corps deployed to Italy

ga: Inniu, chuir Cór Liachta an Aontais, a bhí á chomhordú ag Lárionad Comhordúcháin Práinnfhreagartha an Aontais, foireann dochtúirí agus altraí de chuid na hEorpa ón Rómáin agus ón Iorua go Bergamo.
en: Today, the EU Medical Corps coordinated by the EU Emergency Response Coordination Centre dispatched a team of European doctors and nurses from Romania and Norway to Bergamo.

ga: Financial aid coronavirus
en: Financial aid coronavirus

ga: An 6 Aibreán 2020 – €8 mbilliún chun tacú le tuairim agus 100,000 gnólacht Eorpach
en: 06 April 2020 – €8 billion to support some 100,000 European businesses

ga: Maoiniú chun tacú le faoiseamh agus é a chur ar fáil do tuairim agus 100,000 gnólacht atá thíos le hiarmhairtí eacnamaíocha an choróinvíris, beidh sé ar fáil in Aibreán de réir mar a chuirfidh an Coimisiún Eorpach agus an Ciste Eorpach Infheistíochta €8 mbilliún ar fáil a bhuí leis an gCiste Eorpach le haghaidh Infheistíochtaí Straitéiseacha.
en: Funding to support and provide relief to some 100,000 businesses hit by the economic consequences of the Coronavirus will be available in April as the European Commission and the European Investment Fund unlock €8 billion from thanks to the European Fund for Strategic Investments.

ga: workers producing masks
en: workers producing masks

ga: 03 Aibreán 2020 – Rialacháin maidir le feistí leighis á gcur siar, dleachtanna custaim ar threalamh cosanta á mbaint
en: 03 April 2020 – Postponing regulation for medical devices, lifting customs duties for protective equipment

ga: Mhol an Coimisiún rialacháin maidir le feistí leighis a chur siar bliain amháin le go mbeadh monaróirí in ann díriú ar fheistí leighis ríthábhachtacha a tháirgeadh agus ganntanais nó moilleanna a sheachaint a d’fhéadfadh comhlachtaí rialála a chruthú, agus ar an mbealach sin beatha daoine a shábháil.
en: The Commission proposed to postpone regulations on medical devices by one year to allow manufacturers to focus on the production of critical medical devices and avoiding shortages or delays potentially caused by regulatory bodies, thereby and saving lives.

ga: Rinne an Coimisiún cinneadh freisin dleachtanna custaim agus CBL ar iompórtáil feistí leighis agus trealaimh cosanta phearsanta ó thríú tíortha a bhaint ar bhonn sealadach.
en: The Commission also decided to temporarily lift customs duties and VAT on the import of medical devices and protective equipment from third countries.

ga: Ursula von der Leyen President of the European Commission
en: Ursula von der Leyen President of the European Commission

ga: An 2 Aibreán – An fhreagairt ar an gcoróinvíreas: Gach uile euro á shlógadh ag an gCoimisiún chun beatha daoine agus slite beatha a chosaint
en: 02 April - Coronavirus response: Commission mobilises every euro to protect lives and livelihoods

ga: Chun tacaíocht a thabhairt go tapa d’oibrithe agus na rioscaí dífhostaíochta atá ann mar gheall ar an ráig den choróinvíreas a mhaolú, sheol an Coimisiún tionscnamh nua ar a dtugtar SURE – Tacaíocht chun rioscaí dífhostaíochta in éigeandálaí a mhaolú.
en: To quickly support workers and mitigate the unemployment risks that come with the Coronavirus outbreak, the Commission launched a new initiative called SURE - Support mitigating Unemployment Risks in Emergency.

ga: scientist
en: scientist

ga: An 1 Aibreán 2020 – Ábhar rialaithe nua forbartha ag eolaithe an Choimisiúin le haghaidh tástáil iontaofa ar an gcoróinvíreas ar fud an Aontais
en: 01 April 2020 - Commission scientists develop new control material for reliable Coronavirus-testing across the EU

ga: Tá ábhar rialaithe nua deartha ag eolaithe sa Choimisiún Eorpach, ábhar is féidir a úsáid chun measúnú beacht a dhéanamh ar fheidhmiú a dtástálacha ar an gcoróinvíreas agus chun torthaí bréagdhiúltacha a sheachaint.
en: Scientists at the European Commission have designed a new control material that can be used to accurately assess the functioning of their coronavirus tests and to avoid false negatives.

ga: law
en: law

ga: An 31 Márta 2020 – rabhadh ón Uachtarán von der Leyen: Ní mór do bhearta éigeandála i leith an choróinvíris bunphrionsabail agus bunluachanna an Aontais a urramú
en: 31 March 2020 – President von der Leyen warns: Emergency Coronavirus measures must respect EU fundamental principles and values

ga: Le seachtainí beaga anuas, tá bearta éigeandála glactha ag roinnt Ballstát chun aghaidh a thabhairt ar an ngéarchéim sláinte atá cruthaithe ag an ráig den choróinvíreas.
en: Over the past weeks, several EU Member States have taken emergency measures to address the health crisis caused by the Coronavirus outbreak.

ga: An 30 Márta 2020 – seoladh rannóg thiomnaithe ‘An bhréagaisnéis a chomhrac’ a bhaineann leis an ráig den choróinvíreas
en: 30 March 2020 – launch of a dedicated ‘Fighting disinformation’ section linked to the coronavirus outbreak

ga: Tá borradh faoin mífhaisnéis agus faoin mbréagaisnéis i réimse na sláinte, scéalta faoi COVID-19 san áireamh.
en: Misinformation and disinformation in the health space are thriving, including on COVID-19.

ga: Tá sé tábhachtach gur ar fhoinsí údarásacha, agus orthu sin amháin, a bhíonn tú ag brath chun teacht ar an eolas is déanaí
en: It is important that you rely only on authoritative sources to get updated information

ga: Tá freagairt Eorpach chomhchoiteann don ráig COVID-19 á comhordú ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach.
en: The European Commission is coordinating a common European response to the coronavirus outbreak.

ga: Tá foireann um an bhfreagairt ar an gcoróinvíreas curtha ar bun ag an Uachtarán von der Leyen ar leibhéal polaitiúil lenár bhfreagairt ar an bpaindéim a chomhordú.
en: President von der Leyen has established a Coronavirus response team at political level to coordinate our response to the pandemic

ga: Le linn na géarchéime seo, tá tíortha, réigiúin agus cathracha ar fud an Aontais Eorpaigh ag tabhairt lámh chuidithe dá gcomharsana agus ag cuidiú leo siúd is mó atá i ngátar: tá trealaimh chosanta amhail maisc á ndeonú, tá othair thinne á n-iompar chuig tíortha eile le cóir leighis a fháil agus tá saoránaigh atá sáinnithe thar lear á dtabhairt abhaile.
en: During these times of crisis, across the European Union, countries, regions and cities are stretching out a helping hand to neighbours and assistance is given to those most in need: donations of protective equipment such as masks, cross-border treatments of ill patients and bringing stranded citizens home.

ga: Vacsaíní sábháilte in aghaidh COVID-19 do mhuintir na hEorpa
en: Safe COVID-19 vaccines for Europeans

ga: Vacsaín shábháilte éifeachtach, sin an deis is fearr atá againn chun an lámh in uachtar a fháil ar an gcoróinvíreas agus filleadh ar an ngnáthshaol.
en: A safe and effective vaccine is our best chance to beat coronavirus and return to our normal lives.

ga: Tá an Coimisiún Eorpach ag obair gan stad gan staonadh chun dáileoga de vacsaíní féideartha a chinntiú do gach duine.
en: The European Commission has been working tirelessly to secure doses of potential vaccines, that can be shared with all.

ga: 4 Meitheamh 2021 – Freagairt trádála iltaobhach láidir molta ag an Aontas Eorpach ar phaindéim an choróinvíris
en: 4 June 2021 – The EU proposes a strong multilateral trade response to the coronavirus pandemic

ga: Chuir an tAontas Eorpach a thogra isteach lena n-iarrtar ar bhaill na hEagraíochta Domhanda Trádála gealltanas a thabhairt le haghaidh plean gníomhaíochta maidir le trádáil iltaobhach chun táirgeadh vacsaíní agus cóireálacha in aghaidh COVID-19 a mhéadú.
en: The EU has submitted its proposal seeking the commitment of World Trade Organization members for a multilateral trade action plan to expand the production of COVID-19 vaccines and treatments.

ga: Na príomhphointí is déanaí
en: man holding a leaflet

ga: 21 Nollaig 2020 – an chéad vacsaín shábháilte éifeachtach in aghaidh COVID-19 údaraithe ag an gCoimisiún Eorpach
en: 21 December 2020 - European Commission authorises first safe and effective vaccine against COVID-19

ga: Tá údarú margaíochta coinníollach tugtha ag an gCoimisiún don vacsaín shábháilte éifeachtach in aghaidh COVID-19 atá forbartha ag BioNTech agus Pfizer.
en: The Commission has granted a conditional marketing authorisation for the safe and effective vaccine against COVID‑19 developed by BioNTech and Pfizer.

ga: vaccine
en: vaccine

ga: 17 Nollaig 2020 – An 27, 28 agus 29 Nollaig fógartha mar laethanta Eorpacha an vacsaínithe ag an Uachtarán von der Leyen
en: 17 December 2020 – President von der Leyen announces European vaccination days on 27, 28 and 29 December

ga: Má thugann an Ghníomhaireacht Leigheasra Eorpach agus an Coimisiún Eorpach údarú do vacsaín rathúil éifeachtach, d’fhógair an tUachtarán von der Leyen go gcuirfear tús leis an vacsaíniú i gcoinne an choróinvíris ar fud an Aontais an 27, 28 agus 29 Nollaig.
en: In case of a successful and effective vaccine authorisation by the European Medicines Agency and the European Commission, President von der Leyen announced that on 27, 28 and 29 December vaccination against the coronavirus will start across the EU.

ga: woman in front of EU commission building looking at her smartphone
en: woman in front of EU commission building looking at her smartphone

ga: 14 Nollaig 2020 – Aip mhóibíleach Re-open EU a thugann nuashonruithe rialta ar bhearta sláinte, sábháilteachta agus taistil ar fud na hEorpa seolta ag an gCoimisiún
en: 14 December 2020 – Commission launches Re-open EU mobile app with regular updates on coronavirus health, safety and travel measures across Europe

ga: Sheol an Coimisiún aip mhóibíleach saor in aisce den ardán Re-open EU a thugann eolas cuimsitheach cothrom le dáta maidir leis na bearta sláinte, sábháilteachta agus taistil i mBallstáit uile an Aontais Eorpaigh agus san Eilvéis, san Iorua, san Íoslainn agus i Lichtinstéin.
en: The Commission launched the free Re-open EU mobile app, providing comprehensive, up-to-date information on the health, safety and travel measures in all EU Member States and Iceland, Liechtenstein, Norway and Switzerland.

ga: European democracy action plan
en: European democracy action plan

ga: 3 Nollaig 2020 – An Plean Gníomhaíochta um an Daonlathas Eorpach: daonlathais an Aontais a dhéanamh níos láidre
en: 3 December 2020 – European Democracy Action Plan: making EU democracies stronger

ga: Is éard a chuir paindéim an choróinvíris i dtábhacht na dúshláin atá roimh dhaonlathais an Aontais.
en: The coronavirus pandemic has highlighted challenges to the EU democracies.

ga: Mask and EU flag
en: Mask and EU flag

ga: 2 Nollaig 2020 – Chuir an Coimisiún an straitéis maidir le “Sábháilteacht i dtaca le COVID-19 le linn an gheimhridh” i láthair
en: 2 December 2020 – Commission presents “Staying safe from COVID-19 during winter” strategy

ga: Ghlac an Coimisiún straitéis chun bainistíocht inbhuanaithe a dhéanamh ar an bpaindéim le linn mhíonna an gheimhridh, tráth a d’fhéadfadh méadú teacht ar an riosca tarchuir i ngeall ar dhaoine a bheith ag bailiú le chéile taobh istigh.
en: The Commission adopted a strategy for sustainably managing the pandemic over the coming winter months, when the virus transmission risk may increase owing to indoor gatherings.

ga: Leis an straitéis, moltar airdeall agus aire leanúnach le linn thréimhse an gheimhridh ar fad agus in 2021 nuair a chuirfear tús le vacsaíní sábháilte éifeachtúla a sholáthar.

ga: Tá cur chuige comhordaithe ar fud an Aontais ríthábhachtach chun ráig eile den víreas a sheachaint, agus ní mór forbairt na staide eipidéimeolaíche a chur san áireamh mar chuid de mhaolú ar bith ar bhearta srianta.
en: A coordinated EU-wide approach is key to avoid a resurgence of the virus, and any relaxation of measures should take into account the evolution of the epidemiological situation.
